site.description: Prayer Belts' Mission is to Spread the Word, Strengthen the Commitment among the Faithful, Attract the Attention of the Un-Churched, Re-Engage the Curiosity of the De-Churched, and Create Excitement with a Fun, Fashionable New Way to Pray. Our goal is to equip parents, young adults, teens, boys and girls - anyone of good faith - with a new weapon in the daily battle to profess faith in everyday life.
